content: this free raised ripple alpine stitch hat pattern will show you how to make a beautifully-textured modified alpine stitch crochet beanie using fptr instead of fpdc a faux fur pom pom adds an extra touch of style **the pattern is free with ads on my website ** > but you can also purchase the ad-free > printer-friendly pdf here on ravelry > this pattern can also be found in my > crochet membership which includes over > 400 patterns and 100s of video > tutorials you can join the membership > here 1 ***you can also get this raised ripple alpine stitch hat pattern in an ebook with 54 more crochet hat patterns 9 tutorials and 57 videos right here 2 *** 1 https //www nickishomemadecrafts com/crochet/the-crochet-club/ 2 https //nickinhc--nickishomemadecrafts thrivecart com/crochet-hat-beanie-made-easy/ ref=ravelry
